description: A dynamic information flow analysis for node
name: iflow
readme:
=== INSTALATION ===
From the directory of the project run
    sudo npm install -g
This will install globaly in your system the tool under the name iflow. So it is already available as command line tool.

=== USAGE ===
To use iflow in a project you just need to import it in the following manner:
    var iflow = require("iflow");
This object further offers the following methods: addSource, addSink, source, sink.The command line
tool can be used in the following ways:
1. To run the basic tests
    sudo iflow -t
2. To instrument the current directory
    iflow -i
3. To run the current project
    iflow -r MainClass.js
